author: rcm
msg: In the constructor of the internal drag now take into consideration the padding added by a views containing decorators.

author: rcm
msg: Reinstated the redrawing after a movement of the mouse.  So changes to to screen, such as showing the resize outline, are shown as the mouse moves.

author: rcm
msg: Adjusted the baseline so that draw text is drawn on the baseline, and not one pixel above it.
